response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unparalleled benefits, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. This is a unique chance to secure a significant savings while experiencing the unmatched value this product offers. I trust that you will find this proposal highly attractive and look forward to your positive response.
